owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

environment_name.description: The name of the environment. The name must be URL encoded. For example, any slashes in the name must be replaced with `%2F`.

encrypted_value.description: Value for your secret, encrypted with [LibSodium](https://libsodium.gitbook.io/doc/bindings_for_other_languages) using the public key retrieved from the [Get an environment public key](https://docs.github.com/rest/actions/secrets#get-an-environment-public-key) endpoint.

key_id.description: ID of the key you used to encrypt the secret.
